review_text: Works great; there's nothing like home made ice cream and to have it within minutes with so little effort is a miracle.  For years I used one of the old ice and salt makers that does a great job but you hardly use if because of the mess and effort needed.  If you store the tub in the freezer you can almost decide to have ice cream and satisfy that desire immediately.
product_name: Cuisinart ICE-20 Automatic 1-1/2-Quart Ice Cream Maker, White
